pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayes Factors for Informative Hypotheses // Computes approximated adjusted fractional Bayes factors for equality, inequality, and about equality constrained hypotheses. For a tutorial on this method, see Hoijtink, Mulder, van Lissa, Gu, (2019) doi:10.31234/osf.io/v3shc. For applications in structural equation modeling, see: Van Lissa, Gu, Mulder, Rosseel, Van Zundert, Hoijtink, (2021) doi:10.1080/10705511.2020.1745644. For the statistical underpinnings, see Gu, Mulder, and Hoijtink (2018) doi:10.1111/bmsp.12110; Hoijtink, Gu, Mulder, J. (2019) doi:10.1111/bmsp.12145; Hoijtink, Gu, Mulder, Rosseel, (2019) doi:10.31234/osf.io/q6h5w.
